TEXT.Russian: Чтобы нанять наемников, нажмите на кнопку с "топором" в верхнем левом углу экрана.
TEXT.English: To hire a mercenary, click on the "axe" icon in the upper left hand side of the screen.

TEXT.Russian: Rhye's of Civilization for Civilization III reached 25,000 downloads in 2005.
TEXT.English: Rhye's of Civilization for Civilization III reached 25,000 downloads in 2005.

TEXT.Russian: Switching from an authoritarian civic to Democracy will cause a period of instability.
TEXT.English: Switching from an authoritarian civic to Democracy will cause a period of instability.
TEXT.French: Si vous passez d'une doctrine autoritaire à la démocratie, votre empire connaîtra une période d'instabilité.
TEXT.German: Durch den Wechsel von einer autoritären Staatsform zur Demokratie wird eine Phase der Instabilität ausgelöst.
TEXT.Italian: Passare da una forma di governo autoritaria alla democrazia causerа un periodo di instabilitа.
TEXT.Spanish: Al cambiar de un principio autoritario a la Democracia se producirб un periodo de inestabilidad.

TEXT.English: You can check the parameters influencing your stability in the Financial Advisor

TEXT.Russian: Rhye has been making Civilization mods since Civ II, with his "Ultima Online: T2A" scenario, and has continued modding through each of Civilization's sequels and expansions.
TEXT.English: Rhye has been making Civilization mods since Civ II, with his "Ultima Online: T2A" scenario, and has continued modding through each of Civilization's sequels and expansions.

TEXT.German: Angefangen mit seinem "Ultima Online: T2A"-Szenario entwickelt Rhye schon seit Civilization II Civ-Mods und hat dies auch für alle folgenden Civilization-Teile und -Expansion Packs getan.
TEXT.Italian: Rhye ha iniziato a creare mod per Civilization ai tempi di Civilization II, con lo scenario "Ultima Online: T2A", e ha continuato a creare mod per ognuno dei sequel e delle espansioni di Civilization.
TEXT.Spanish: Rhye diseсa mods para Civilization desde Civilization II, con su escenario "Ultima Online: T2A". Desde entonces ha realizado mods para todas las secuelas y expansiones.

TEXT.Russian: Открытие медицины защитит страну от чумы.
TEXT.English: Discovering medicine will keep you safe from plagues
TEXT.French: La découverte de la médecine vous protégera de la peste.
TEXT.German: Die Erforschung der "Medizin" bewahrt Sie vor der Pest.
TEXT.Italian: Scoprendo la medicina sarai al sicuro dalla peste.
TEXT.Spanish: Cuando descubras la Medicina estarбs a salvo de la peste.

TEXT.Russian: Visit the official site for "Rhye's and Fall" at http://rhye.civfanatics.net
TEXT.English: Visit the official site for "Rhye's and Fall" at http://rhye.civfanatics.net
TEXT.French: Visitez le site officiel de "Rhye's and Fall" sur http://rhye.civfanatics.net (site en anglais).

TEXT.Italian: Visita il sito ufficiale di "Rhye's and Fall" all'indirizzo http://rhye.civfanatics.net
TEXT.Spanish: Visita el sitio web oficial de "Rhye's and Fall" en http://rhye.civfanatics.net

TEXT.Russian: Attack Russia to find out if Napoleon was right when he talked about "General Winter"
TEXT.English: Attack Russia to find out if Napoleon was right when he talked about "General Winter"
TEXT.French: Attaquez la Russie pour découvrir si Napoléon avait raison au sujet de l'hiver russe.
TEXT.German: Greifen Sie Russland an und überzeugen Sie sich von der Richtigkeit von Napoleons Aussage über den "General Winter".
TEXT.Italian: Attacca la Russia per scoprire se Napoleone aveva ragione, quando parlava del "Generale Inverno".
TEXT.Spanish: Ataca Rusia y comprobarбs si Napoleуn tenнa razуn al hablar del "general Invierno".

TEXT.Russian: Aztec military units can enslave defeated enemy units
TEXT.English: Aztec military units can enslave defeated enemy units
TEXT.French: Les unités militaires aztèques peuvent asservir les unités ennemies vaincues.
TEXT.German: Aztekische Militäreinheiten können besiegte feindliche Einheiten versklaven.
TEXT.Italian: Le unitа militari azteche possono schiavizzare le unitа nemiche sconfitte.
TEXT.Spanish: Las unidades militares aztecas pueden esclavizar a las unidades enemigas derrotadas.

TEXT.Russian: Myriads (meaning 10 000) are commonly used in Chinese numbering system
TEXT.English: Myriads (meaning 10 000) are commonly used in Chinese numbering system
TEXT.French: Le système numérique chinois utilise souvent le terme de myriade, équivalent à 10 000.
TEXT.German: Myriaden (sprich 10.000) sind im chinesischen Zahlensystem allgemein gebräuchlich.
TEXT.Italian: Le miriadi (che significa 10.000) vengono comunemente usate nel sistema di numerazione cinese.
TEXT.Spanish: Las mirнadas (que equivalen a 10.000) se utilizan con frecuencia en el sistema de numeraciуn chino.

TEXT.Russian: "Entente" is the French word for diplomatic understanding
TEXT.English: "Entente" is the French word for diplomatic understanding
TEXT.French: "Entente" est un terme utilisé pour parler des accords diplomatiques.
TEXT.German: "Entente" ist das französische Wort für diplomatisches Einverständnis.
TEXT.Italian: "Entente" и la parola francese che indica l'intesa diplomatica.
TEXT.Spanish: "Entente" es un galicismo que significa acuerdo entre paнses.

TEXT.Russian: This Earth map is based on Robinson's projection
TEXT.English: This Earth map is based on Robinson's projection
TEXT.French: Cette carte de la Terre est basée sur la projection de Robinson.
TEXT.German: Diese Weltkarte basiert auf der Robinson-Projektion.
TEXT.Italian: Questa mappa della Terra si basa sulla proiezione di Robinson.
TEXT.Spanish: Este mapamundi se basa en la proyecciуn de Robinson.

TEXT.Russian: Not every lake produces 2 food. Some are salt lakes, and thus produce 1 food, like coast.
TEXT.English: Not every lake produces 2 food. Some are salt lakes, and thus produce 1 food, like coast.
TEXT.French: Les lacs ne produisent pas tous 2 nourriture. Les lacs salés produisent seulement 1 nourriture, comme les côtes.
TEXT.German: Nicht jeder See produziert 2 Nahrung. Einige von ihnen sind Salzwasserseen, die aus diesem Grund wie Küsten-Geländefelder nur 1 Nahrung produzieren.
TEXT.Italian: Non tutti i laghi producono 2 cibo. Alcuni sono laghi salati, quindi producono 1 cibo, come la costa.
TEXT.Spanish: No todos los lagos producen 2 alimentos. Algunos son salados y, por tanto, producen 1 alimento, como las costas.

TEXT.Russian: If you get a skull over your cities, it means they have the plague! The population and units in the city and in the surrounding region will probably decrease dramatically. To reduce the effects and the duration of plague, keep your cities healthy.
TEXT.English: If you get a skull over your cities, it means they have the plague! The population and units in the city and in the surrounding region will probably decrease dramatically. To reduce the effects and the duration of plague, keep your cities healthy.
TEXT.French: Si un crâne apparaît au-dessus d'une de vos villes, cela signifie qu'elle est frappée par la peste ! Attendez-vous alors à voir la population et les unités dans la ville et la région environnante diminuer considérablement. Pour réduire la durée et les effets de la peste, gardez vos villes en bonne santé.
TEXT.German: Wenn ein Totenkopf über Ihren Städten eingeblendet wird, bedeutet dies, dass dort die Pest ausgebrochen ist! Die Anzahl der Bevölkerung und Einheiten in der betreffenden Stadt und ihrer näheren Umgebung werden aller Voraussicht nach dramatisch sinken. Um die Auswirkungen und Dauer der Pest zu reduzieren, sollten Sie den Gesundheitswert Ihrer Städte möglichst hoch halten.
TEXT.Italian: Se vedi un teschio sulle tue cittа significa che c'и la peste! Popolazione e unitа in cittа e nella zona circostante diminuiranno drasticamente. Per ridurre effetti e durata della peste mantieni in salute le tue cittа.
TEXT.Spanish: Si aparece una calavera sobre tus ciudades... ¡es por que tienen la peste! La poblaciуn y las unidades de la ciudad y su regiуn circundante probablemente comiencen a decrecer dramбticamente. Para reducir los efectos y la duraciуn de la peste, mantйn elevada la salud de tus ciudades.

TEXT.Russian: Plague can spread in many ways - through trade routes, along roads and between neighbouring cities.
TEXT.English: Plague can spread in many ways - through trade routes, along roads and between neighbouring cities.
TEXT.French: La peste peut se propager de nombreuses façons. Elle peut être apportée par les routes commerciales, les routes et les villes voisines.
TEXT.German: Die Pest kann sich auf viele Arten ausbreiten - über Handelswege, Straßen und zwischen benachbarten Städten.
TEXT.Italian: La peste si puт diffondere in molti modi: attraverso rotte commerciali, lungo le strade e tra cittа confinanti.
TEXT.Spanish: La peste se puede propagar de muchas maneras, a travйs de las rutas comerciales, por los caminos o entre ciudades vecinas.

TEXT.Russian: The civilization you choose to play affects your difficulty every bit as much as the difficulty level you choose. Make sure to pick a civ that suits your playing style and your level of expertise.
TEXT.English: The civilization you choose to play affects your difficulty every bit as much as the difficulty level you choose. Make sure to pick a civ that suits your playing style and your level of expertise.
TEXT.French: La difficulté du jeu dépend tout autant du niveau de difficulté sélectionné que de la civilisation avec laquelle vous jouez. Veillez à choisir une civilisation qui correspond à votre façon de jouer et à votre niveau d'expérience.
TEXT.German: Neben dem eingestellten Schwierigkeitsgrad wirkt sich auch die Wahl der Zivilisation auf das Schwierigkeitsniveau im Spiel aus. Achten Sie deshalb darauf, eine Zivilisation zu wählen, die Ihrem Spielstil und Ihrem Erfahrungsstand entspricht.
TEXT.Italian: La civiltа che scegli influenza la difficoltа tanto quanto il livello di difficoltа che hai scelto. Assicurati di selezionare una civiltа che sia adatta al tuo stile di gioco e al tuo livello di esperienza.
TEXT.Spanish: La civilizaciуn que elijas afecta a la dificultad tanto como el nivel de dificultad que elijas. Elige una civilizaciуn que se acomode a tu estilo de juego y tu nivel de experiencia.

TEXT.Russian: Every civ has hidden modifiers that influence their growth. This way, modern civs are not disadvantaged by their late start.
TEXT.English: Every civ has hidden modifiers that influence their growth. This way, modern civs are not disadvantaged by their late start.
TEXT.French: Des modificateurs cachés influent sur le développement de chaque civilisation. Ainsi, les civilisations modernes ne sont pas désavantagées en commençant plus tard.
TEXT.German: Jede Zivilisation verfügt über verborgene Modifikatoren, die ihr Wachstum beeinflussen. Auf diese Weise werden auch moderne Zivilisationen trotz ihres späteren Spielstarts nicht benachteiligt.
TEXT.Italian: Ogni civiltа ha dei modificatori nascosti che ne influenzano la crescita. In questo modo le civiltа moderne non sono svantaggiate dall'avvio in ritardo.
TEXT.Spanish: Todas las civilizaciones tienen modificadores ocultos que afectan a su crecimiento. De este modo, el inicio tardнo de las civilizaciones modernas no constituye una desventaja.

TEXT.Russian: You can declare war on independent states and minor civs only by moving your units into their territory.
TEXT.English: You can declare war on independent states and minor civs only by moving your units into their territory.
TEXT.French: Vous ne pouvez déclarer la guerre aux états indépendants et aux petites civilisations qu'en envoyant des unités sur leur territoire.
TEXT.German: Sie können unabhängigen Staaten und unbedeutenderen Zivilisationen nur dadurch den Krieg erklären, dass Sie Ihre Einheiten in ihr Territorium einmarschieren lassen.

TEXT.Spanish: Puedes declarar la guerra a estados independientes y civilizaciones menores si mueves tus unidades a su territorio.

TEXT.Russian: Great Depressions are caused by a disproportion between production and wealth, which triggers deflation.
TEXT.English: Great Depressions are caused by a disproportion between production and wealth, which triggers deflation.
TEXT.French: Les grandes crises sont provoquées par une déflation, due à un déséquilibre entre la production et la richesse.
TEXT.German: Eine Große Depression wird in erster Linie durch ein Missverhältnis zwischen Produktion und Wohlstand verursacht und löst eine Deflation aus.
TEXT.Italian: La Grande Depressione viene causata da una disparitа tra produzione e ricchezza, che causa deflazione.
TEXT.Spanish: La Gran Depresiуn es provocada por la desproporciуn entre la producciуn y la riqueza, que causa deflacciуn.

TEXT.Russian: Transition from state property to another economic system will cause a period of instability.
TEXT.English: Transition from state property to another economic system will cause a period of instability.
TEXT.French: Le passage au capitalisme provoquera une période d'instabilité.
TEXT.German: Durch den Wechsel vom Staatseigentum zu einem anderen Wirtschaftssystem wird eine Phase der Instabilität ausgelöst.
TEXT.Italian: Il passaggio al capitalismo causerа un periodo di instabilitа.
TEXT.Spanish: La transiciуn al capitalismo producirб un periodo de inestabilidad.

TEXT.Russian: Combining certain civics will improve or harm the stability of your empire.
TEXT.English: Combining certain civics will improve or harm the stability of your empire.
TEXT.French: La combinaison de certaines doctrines peut améliorer ou réduire la stabilité de votre empire.
TEXT.German: Die Kombination bestimmter Staatsformen kann die Stabilität Ihrer Zivilisation verbessern oder auch beeinträchtigen.
TEXT.Italian: Combinare alcune forme di governo puт migliorare o peggiorare la stabilitа del tuo impero.
TEXT.Spanish: Al combinar algunos principios mejorarбs o perjudicarбs la estabilidad de tu imperio.

TEXT.Russian: You can't see the current year until you discover calendar.
TEXT.English: You can't see the current year until you discover calendar.
TEXT.French: Vous ne pouvez pas connaître l'année actuelle avant d'avoir découvert le calendrier.
TEXT.German: Das aktuelle Spieljahr ist bis zur Entdeckung des "Kalenders" nicht sichtbar.
TEXT.Italian: Non puoi sapere in che anno ti trovi fino a quando non scopri il calendario.
TEXT.Spanish: No podrбs ver el aсo actual hasta que descubras el calendario.

TEXT.Russian: Remember that you can always take control of a newborn civ if you don't like the civilization you started with. You can also use this feature to play from 3000BC even when you want to pick a civ that starts later on.
TEXT.English: Remember that you can always take control of a newborn civ if you don't like the civilization you started with. You can also use this feature to play from 3000BC even when you want to pick a civ that starts later on.
TEXT.French: N'oubliez pas que vous pouvez toujours prendre le contrôle d'une civilisation émergente, si la civilisation avec laquelle vous avez commencé ne vous plaît pas. Vous pouvez aussi utiliser cette option pour jouer à partir de 3000 av. J.-C., même si vous voulez choisir une civilisation qui commence plus tard.
TEXT.German: Beachten Sie, dass Sie jederzeit eine neu entstandene Zivilisation übernehmen können, wenn Sie mit der Zivilisation, die Sie zuerst gewählt haben, nicht zufrieden sind. Sie können diese Möglichkeit auch nutzen, um bereits ab dem Jahr 3000 v. Chr. zu spielen, obwohl Sie sich eigentlich eine Zivilisation ausgesucht haben, die erst später im Spiel startet.
TEXT.Italian: Ricorda che puoi sempre assumere il controllo di una civiltа appena sorta, se non ti piace quella con cui hai iniziato. Inoltre puoi usare questa caratteristica per cominciare a giocare dal 3000 a.C. anche se vuoi scegliere una civiltа che comincia più tardi.

TEXT.English: Combining Totalitarianism and Universal Suffrage isn't a good idea.
TEXT.French: Il est déconseillé d'instaurer la liberté d'expression dans un état policier.
TEXT.German: Die Kombination von Totalitarismus und Allgemeines Wahlrecht ist keine gute Idee.

TEXT.Russian: In Rhye's and Fall of Civilization, vassals can declare war.
TEXT.English: In Rhye's and Fall of Civilization, vassals can declare war.

TEXT.Spanish: En Rhye's and Fall of Civilization los ingresos mбximos de un santuario o corporaciуn son de 20 monedas por turno.

TEXT.Russian: In Rhye's and Fall of Civilization, the Colosseum is a world wonder. The generic building is called an "amphitheatre."

TEXT.Russian: If you like the mod, and if you have any ideas to improve it, or you just have a bug to report, make sure to check out the development forum at CivFanatics.com.
TEXT.English: If you like the mod, and if you have any ideas to improve it, or you just have a bug to report, make sure to check out the development forum at CivFanatics.com.

TEXT.Spanish: Si te gusta el mod y tienes ideas para mejorarlo o has encontrado algún error del que informar, visita el foro de diseсo en CivFanatics.com.

TEXT.Russian: If it's been a while since the last time you got an updated version of the mod, make sure to check CivFanatics.com for a new version. The mod is in active development, and updates are uploaded often. Every update is full of fixes and new features.
TEXT.English: If it's been a while since the last time you got an updated version of the mod, make sure to check CivFanatics.com for a new version. The mod is in active development, and updates are uploaded often. Every update is full of fixes and new features.

Bei diesem Mod handelt es sich um ein aktives Entwicklungsprojekt und dementsprechend häufig werden neue Updates bereitgestellt, von denen jedes zahlreiche Fixes und neue Features enthält.
TEXT.Italian: Se и passato un po' di tempo dall'ultima volta che hai scaricato una versione aggiornata del mod, assicurati di controllare su CivFanatics.com se ce n'и una nuova. Il mod и in continuo sviluppo e spesso vengono caricati degli aggiornamenti, ognuno dei quali и pieno di novitа e risolve i problemi di quelli precedenti.

El mod estб en continuo desarrollo, por lo que las actualizaciones son frecuentes. Todas las actualizaciones incluyen nuevas caracterнsticas y soluciones de errores.

TEXT.Russian: Creating an enormous empire may seem tempting, but you have to be very careful not to let your expansion destabilize your empire! The Expansion Civics can help with that.
TEXT.English: Creating an enormous empire may seem tempting, but you have to be very careful not to let your expansion destabilize your empire! The Expansion Civics can help with that.

TEXT.Spanish: Crear un imperio enorme puede ser tentador, pero debes tener cuidado para que tu expansiуn no lo desestabilice. Los principios de expansiуn te ayudarбn a conseguirlo.

TEXT.Russian: When a Historical goal asks for colonizing a territory, you must found a certain number of cities in it. When it asks to control a territory, you can just conquer it.
TEXT.English: When a Historical goal asks for colonizing a territory, you must found a certain number of cities in it. When it asks to control a territory, you can just conquer it.
TEXT.French: Quand un objectif historique exige que vous colonisiez un territoire, vous devez y fonder un certain nombre de villes. Quand il exige de contrôler un territoire, vous pouvez simplement le conquérir.
TEXT.German: Wenn eine historische Zielvorgabe die Kolonisierung eines Territoriums verlangt, müssen Sie dort eine bestimmte Anzahl von Städten gründen. Sollen Sie dagegen ein Territorium unter Ihre Kontrolle bringen, brauchen Sie es lediglich zu erobern.
TEXT.Italian: Quando un obiettivo storico richiede la colonizzazione di un territorio significa che devi fondarci un certo numero di cittа. Quando invece ne richiede il controllo, ti basta conquistarlo.
TEXT.Spanish: Cuando un objetivo histуrico te pida que colonices un territorio, debes fundar una cantidad determinada de ciudades en йl. Cuando te pida que controles un territorio, basta con conquistarlo.

TEXT.Russian: In Rhye's and Fall of Civilization, camera flying mode hotkey has changed to [CTRL + F]
TEXT.English: In Rhye's and Fall of Civilization, camera flying mode hotkey has changed to [CTRL + F]
TEXT.French: Dans Rhye's and Fall of Civilization, le raccourci pour activer la caméra libre est [CTRL + F].
TEXT.German: In Rhye's and Fall of Civilization ist die Schnelltaste für den Kameraflugmodus [STRG + F]
TEXT.Italian: In Rhye's and Fall la combinazione di tasti per la selezione rapida della visuale dall'alto и diventata [CTRL + F]
TEXT.Spanish: En Rhye's and Fall of Civilization se ha cambiado el atajo de teclado para la cбmara aйrea a [CTRL + F].

TEXT.Russian: In Rhye's and Fall of Civilization, city founding is not allowed in tundra, ice or desert if far from water.
TEXT.English: In Rhye's and Fall of Civilization, city founding is not allowed in tundra, ice or desert if far from water.
TEXT.French: Dans Rhye's and Fall of Civilization, il est impossible de fonder une ville sur une case de toundra, de désert ou de glace trop loin de l'eau.
TEXT.German: In Rhye's and Fall of Civilization ist die Gründung einer Stadt auf den Geländearten Tundra, Eis und Wüste, sofern zu weit von einer Wasserquelle entfernt, nicht zulässig.
TEXT.Italian: In Rhye's and Fall non и permessa la fondazione di cittа nella tundra, sul ghiaccio o nel deserto, se distanti dall'acqua.
TEXT.Spanish: En Rhye's and Fall of Civilization no se permite fundar ciudades en tundra, hielo o desierto si no hay agua cerca.

TEXT.Russian: In Rhye's and Fall of Civilization, jungle, rainforest and marshes are impassable to most land units.
TEXT.English: In Rhye's and Fall of Civilization, jungle, rainforest and marshes are impassable to most land units.
TEXT.French: Dans Rhye's and Fall of Civilization, la plupart des unités terrestres ne peuvent pas franchir les marais et les jungles.
TEXT.German: In Rhye's and Fall of Civilization sind Dschungel-, Regenwald- und Sumpf-Geländefelder für die meisten Landeinheiten unpassierbar.
TEXT.Italian: In Rhye's and Fall giungle e paludi sono impossibili da attraversare per la maggior parte delle unitа terrestri.
TEXT.Spanish: En Rhye's and Fall of Civilization la mayorнa de las unidades terrestres no pueden atravesar junglas ni ciйnagas.

TEXT.Russian: If you attempt to stop the growth of newborn civs, some of your units will flip to their side.
TEXT.English: If you attempt to stop the growth of newborn civs, some of your units will flip to their side.
TEXT.French: Si vous tentez d'arrêter le développement d'une civilisation émergente, certaines de vos unités se rangeront de son côté.
TEXT.German: Wenn Sie versuchen, das Wachstum neu entstandener Zivilisationen zu behindern, werden einige Ihrer Einheiten die Seiten wechseln.
TEXT.Italian: Se provi a fermare la crescita delle civiltа appena nate, alcune delle tue unitа passeranno dalla loro parte.
TEXT.Spanish: Si intentas frenar el crecimiento de civilizaciones recientes, algunas de tus unidades se unirбn a ellas.

TEXT.Russian: In Rhye's and Fall of Civilization, many wonder effects have been changed
TEXT.English: In Rhye's and Fall of Civilization, many wonder effects have been changed
TEXT.French: Dans Rhye's and Fall of Civilization, les effets de beaucoup de merveilles ont été modifiés.
TEXT.German: In Rhye's and Fall of Civilization wurden die Auswirkungen vieler Wunder geändert.
TEXT.Italian: In Rhye's and Fall sono stati cambiati gli effetti di molte Grandi Meraviglie.
TEXT.Spanish: En Rhye's and Fall of Civilization se han cambiado los efectos de muchas maravillas.

TEXT.Russian: If you can read Russian, visit civfanatics.ru. It hosts a large community that translates the mod into Russian and is making a dedicated wikipedia
TEXT.English: If you can read Russian, visit civfanatics.ru. It hosts a large community that translates the mod into Russian and is making a dedicated wikipedia
TEXT.French: Si vous lisez le russe, rendez-vous sur civfanatics.ru. Ce site héberge une grande communauté qui traduit le mod en russe et y consacre une page Wikipedia.
TEXT.German: Wenn Sie die russische Sprache beherrschen, sollten Sie der Site civfanatics.ru einen Besuch abstatten. Hier arbeitet eine große Community an der Übersetzung des Mods ins Russische und entwickelt einen Civ-spezifischen Wikipedia-Beitrag.
TEXT.Italian: Se sai il russo vai al sito civfanatics.ru. Ospita una grande comunitа che traduce il mod in russo e sta creando una wikipedia dedicata.
TEXT.Spanish: Si lees ruso, visita civfanatics.ru. Es el sitio web de una numerosa comunidad que estб traduciendo el mod al ruso y creando una wikipedia.

TEXT.Russian: You can't build another civ's embassy while you're at war with it. Furthermore, when war is declared, the pair of embassies, if already built, are automatically destroyed.
TEXT.English: You can't build another civ's embassy while you're at war with it. Furthermore, when war is declared, the pair of embassies, if already built, are automatically destroyed.
TEXT.French: Vous ne pouvez pas construire l'ambassade d'une civilisation avec laquelle vous êtes en guerre. Par ailleurs, si vous entrez en guerre avec une civilisation, son ambassade sera détruite automatiquement si vous l'avez déjà construite, et la vôtre connaîtra le même sort.
TEXT.German: Solange Sie sich mit einer anderen Zivilisation im Krieg befinden, können Sie keine Botschaft für diese Nation errichten. Im Falle einer Kriegserklärung werden die gegenseitigen Botschaften, sofern sie bereits existieren, automatisch zerstört.
TEXT.Italian: Non puoi costruire l'ambasciata di una civiltа, se siete in guerra. Inoltre quando viene dichiarata la guerra le ambasciate, se sono giа state costruite, vengono automaticamente distrutte.
TEXT.Spanish: No podrбs construir una embajada de otra civilizaciуn si estбs en guerra con ella. Ademбs, cuando se declara la guerra, vuestras embajadas, si las tenйis, serбn automбticamente destruidas.

TEXT.Russian: To avoid losing contact with another civilization, build their embassy in one of your cities. Your embassy will be automatically placed in one of their cities.
TEXT.English: To avoid losing contact with another civilization, build their embassy in one of your cities. Your embassy will be automatically placed in one of their cities.
TEXT.French: Pour éviter de perdre le contact avec une autre civilisation, construisez son ambassade dans une de vos villes. Votre ambassade sera placée automatiquement dans une de ses villes.
TEXT.German: Um dauerhaften Kontakt mit einer anderen Zivilisation zu halten, sollten Sie in einer Ihrer Städte eine Botschaft für diese Nation errichten. Gleichzeitig wird automatisch auch eine Botschaft für Ihre Zivilisation in einer deren Städte eingerichtet.
TEXT.Italian: Per evitare di perdere i contatti con un'altra civiltа costruisci la sua ambasciata in una delle tue cittа. La tua ambasciata verrа automaticamente costruita in una delle cittа dell'altra civiltа.
TEXT.Spanish: Para evitar perder el contacto con otra civilizaciуn, construye su embajada en una de tus ciudades. Tu embajada se colocarб automбticamente en una de las suyas.

TEXT.Russian: You can build no more than 5 embassies per city.
TEXT.English: You can build no more than 5 embassies per city.
TEXT.French: Vous ne pouvez pas construire plus de cinq ambassades par ville.
TEXT.German: Es können maximal 5 Botschaften pro Stadt errichtet werden.
TEXT.Italian: Non puoi costruire più di 5 ambasciate per cittа.
TEXT.Spanish: No puedes construir mбs de 5 embajadas por ciudad.

TEXT.English: Never say "cat" if you don't have it in your sack (G.Trapattoni)
TEXT.French: "Non dire gatto se non ce l'hai nel sacco." (Il ne faut pas vendre la peau de l'ours avant de l'avoir tué.) _ G. Trapattoni

TEXT.Italian: Non dire "gatto" se non ce l'hai nel sacco. (G.Trapattoni)
TEXT.Spanish: No hay que vender la piel del oso antes de haberlo cazado.

TEXT.Russian: Компьютер, управляющий монголами, получает дополнительные армии для нападния на Россию и Средний Восток. Будте готовы к этому!
TEXT.English: AI Mongols receive additional armies to attack Russia and the Middle East. Be prepared!

TEXT.Russian: В Dawn of Civilization, у некоторых цивилизаций, например Византии, Италии и Тайланда, появление является условным, они появляются не в каждой игре.
TEXT.English: In Dawn of Civilization, several civilizations like Byzantium, Italy and Thailand have conditional spawns, and don't appear in every game.

TEXT.Russian: Several AI civilizations flip larger areas on spawn to help them along.
TEXT.English: Several AI civilizations flip larger areas on spawn to help them along.

TEXT.Russian: В Dawn of Civilization бесплетные технологии от Либерализма, Оракула и подобных им эффектов позволяют выбирать технологии только текущей эры и предшествующих ей.
TEXT.English: In Dawn of Civilization, free technology effects like Liberalism or the Oracle only allow you to choose technologies of your current or earlier eras.

TEXT.Russian: Если вы играете за Западную Цивилизацию, постройте Торговую Компанию, чтобы провести экспансию в Южную Азию.
TEXT.English: If you're playing as a Western European civilization, build a Trading Company to expand to South Asia.

TEXT.Russian: Pagan Temples cannot be built in cities that have a religion, and when a religion spreads to a city with a Pagan Temple, it is replaced by that religion's temple instead.
TEXT.English: Pagan Temples cannot be built in cities that have a religion, and when a religion spreads to a city with a Pagan Temple, it is replaced by that religion's temple instead.
In Dawn of Civilization, Nationalism is not necessary for the resurrection of civilizations. Instead they can only happen in historically appropriate periods.

TEXT.Russian: You need to discover Astronomy before you can vassalize far away civilizations.
TEXT.English: You need to discover Astronomy before you can vassalize far away civilizations.

TEXT.Russian: You need to discover Astronomy before you can train settlers on other continents than your capital's.
TEXT.English: You need to discover Astronomy before you can train settlers on other continents than your capital's.

TEXT.Russian: In Dawn of Civilization, units cannot be killed by the plague, only weakened.
TEXT.English: In Dawn of Civilization, units cannot be killed by the plague, only weakened.
Related religions like Hinduism and Buddhism or Confucianism and Taoism don't create unhappiness if one of them is your state religion

TEXT.Russian: The Seljuks appear in the Middle East in the 11th century. Be prepared!
TEXT.English: The Seljuks appear in the Middle East in the 11th century. Be prepared!

TEXT.Russian: Adopt the Vassalage civic to gain access to Levies.
TEXT.English: Adopt the Vassalage civic to gain access to Levies.

TEXT.Russian: Adopt the Pantheon civic to gain access to Classical wonders.
TEXT.English: Adopt the Pantheon civic to gain access to Classical wonders.

TEXT.Russian: Related religions like Hinduism and Buddhism or Confucianism and Taoism create reduced diplomacy penalties
TEXT.English: Related religions like Hinduism and Buddhism or Confucianism and Taoism create reduced diplomacy penalties

TEXT.Russian: Corporation headquarters and executives have been removed, corporations spread on their own if the prerequisites are met.
TEXT.English: Corporation headquarters and executives have been removed, corporations spread on their own if the prerequisites are met.

TEXT.Russian: The Silk Route and Trading Company corporations can only spread in historically accurate regions.
TEXT.English: The Silk Route and Trading Company corporations can only spread in historically accurate regions.

TEXT.Russian: To attract corporations, acquire more of its resources, build associated buildings, or adopt the Free Market civic.
TEXT.English: To attract corporations, acquire more of its resources, build associated buildings, or adopt the Free Market civic.

TEXT.Russian: In Dawn of Civilization, many wonders have religion or civic prerequisites to encourage their historical distribution.
TEXT.English: In Dawn of Civilization, many wonders have religion or civic prerequisites to encourage their historical distribution.

TEXT.Russian: Buddhism cannot be founded by discovering a technology anymore. Build a Hindu temple to found it instead.
TEXT.English: Buddhism cannot be founded by discovering a technology anymore. Build a Hindu temple to found it instead.

TEXT.Russian: Researching Printing Press as a Catholic civilization starts the Reformation, prompting all Catholic civilizations to decide if they want to convert to Protestantism.
TEXT.English: Researching Printing Press as a Catholic civilization starts the Reformation, prompting all Catholic civilizations to decide if they want to convert to Protestantism.

TEXT.Russian: In Dawn of Civilization, vassals can keep control of the first ring around its cities, unless the tile is also part of a master's city's first ring.
TEXT.English: In Dawn of Civilization, vassals can keep control of the first ring around its cities, unless the tile is also part of a master's city's first ring.

TEXT.Russian: When a UHV goal asks to control a civilization, you need to own more cities in their core than they do.
TEXT.English: When a UHV goal asks to control a civilization, you need to own more cities in their core than they do.

TEXT.Russian: Areas that are relevant to your UHV are displayed in light blue in the tile tooltip.
TEXT.English: Areas that are relevant to your UHV are displayed in light blue in the tile tooltip.

TEXT.Russian: Dawn of Civilization is still actively developed. You can get the latest bugfixes and additions by using the SVN version of the mod. Visit the forum under http://forums.civfanatics.com/forumdisplay.php?f=452 to find out how.
TEXT.English: Dawn of Civilization is still actively developed. You can get the latest bugfixes and additions by using the SVN version of the mod. Visit the forum under http://forums.civfanatics.com/forumdisplay.php?f=452 to find out how.

TEXT.Russian: Building the Apostolic Palace triggers a Schism between Catholic and Orthodox Christianity. An Eastern Christian civilization will receive the Orthodox holy city and all Catholic civilizations will be asked to convert to Orthodoxy.
TEXT.English: Building the Apostolic Palace triggers a Schism between Catholic and Orthodox Christianity. An Eastern Christian civilization will receive the Orthodox holy city and all Catholic civilizations will be asked to convert to Orthodoxy.

TEXT.Russian: Great works (created by great artists) now produce 800 culture per game era.
TEXT.English: Great works (created by great artists) now produce 800 culture per game era.

TEXT.Russian: Train a persecutor to remove non-state religions from your cities.
TEXT.English: Train a persecutor to remove non-state religions from your cities.

TEXT.Russian: Confused about the expansion and civic stability rules? Look them up under the Concepts section in the Civilopedia!
TEXT.English: Confused about the expansion and civic stability rules? Look them up under the Concepts section in the Civilopedia!

TEXT.Russian: The soundtracks you hear during the Classical, Medieval and Renaissance eras depend on your state religion.
TEXT.English: The soundtracks you hear during the Classical, Medieval and Renaissance eras depend on your state religion.

TEXT.Russian: AI Romans and Greeks will receive armies to conquer the Mediterranean and Mesopotamia. Be prepared!
TEXT.English: AI Romans and Greeks will receive armies to conquer the Mediterranean and Mesopotamia. Be prepared!

TEXT.Russian: Cities on islands of size five or less also act as improvements for the resource they are founded on, yielding the full production and commerce increase for the city tile.
TEXT.English: Cities on islands of size five or less also act as improvements for the resource they are founded on, yielding the full production and commerce increase for the city tile.
Slaves can be created using the "enslave" button in cities in Sub-Saharan Africa while using Slavery.
Defeating Impis and Pombos on your territory while using Slavery has a chance to create a slave unit.
Acquire slaves to build slave plantations or settle them in your cities. This option is only available in North America or in Africa unless your capital is in Africa.

TEXT.Russian: You can trade slaves when interacting with other civilizations in the diplomacy interface.
TEXT.English: You can trade slaves when interacting with other civilizations in the diplomacy interface.
Slave plantations and slave specialists are removed once you adopt Egalitarianism.

TEXT.Russian: Goody huts are placed randomly at the beginning of the game.
TEXT.English: Goody huts are placed randomly at the beginning of the game.
The area certain civilizations flip on spawn is not always identical to their core. Several civilizations can flip larger areas.
The core of several civilizations expands on certain conditions, such as entering a new era.
The stability and flip zone maps for all civilizations can be found in the Maps folder.
The Tamils, Moors, Tibetan, Polish and Congolese civilizations can be configured not to appear in every game. Edit the XML\GlobalDefinesAlt.xml file.

The Polynesian and Harappan civilizations are intended for the human player only. You can enable them for the AI in XML\GlobalDefinesAlt.xml, however their AI will not be geared towards playing successfully or realistically.
Stability checks can increase or reduce your stability level and in the latter case, lead to crises and even collapse!
Stability checks are triggered by a variety of events including discovering techs, changing civics and losing or acquiring cities.
Golden Ages protect you from most negative effects of being unstable. The protection only lasts as long as the Golden Age, however.
DoC adds a new terrain feature, rainforests. They resemble jungles, but cause no unhealthiness and can be improved after the discovery of Metal Casting.
In DoC, Ocean tiles start out yielding no food. Improvements on Ocean tiles require Compass, but in turn provide one additional food.
Islands are a new maritime terrain feature that provides additional production, tile defense and faster culture spread.
Instead of spreading their culture in rings with every new culture level, cities spread cultural control over individual tiles as their culture grows.
The amount of culture needed to cover a tile depends on its terrain type and features, as well as the distance to cities.
Cities will start with covering tiles with the lowest culture costs.
City culture will never expand beyond the third ring.
The amount of culture required for the next tile to be covered is displayed as tick marks on the culture bar in the city screen.
A purple circle marks the next tile to be culturally covered in the city screen.
A Great Statesman can put an end to war or anarchy, improve diplomatic relations, build an Administrative Center or reform your civics for free.
Oases provide more food and less commerce. In exchange, cottages can be built on Oases.
Spies can now accumulate experience and acquire promotions by successfully completing missions.
Spy specialists have been removed. Instead, global spy experience is accumulated similar to military experience. If the bar is full, your most experienced spy becomes a Great Spy.
If you have problems with game performance in the late game, enabling graphics paging in the BUG menu can help on some machines.
